EmailTemplate.description: Sent to NH customers to advise that issue has been resolved and we are closing the case
EmailTemplate.name: Resolved - NH Case Clean up
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Alert:(Indicate Request) Request Completed- Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, We noticed an open case regarding a resolved issue/request that you raised on {!Case.CreatedDate}.
Since it is resolved, we will be closing the case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Please call us at 1-877-344-6637 if you still need help or require more information.We're here for you Monday through Friday from 7 a.m. until 4 p.m. Alternatively you can simply respond to this email if you have additional questions.
Regards,
New Homes Customer Support | Tel: 1-877-344-6637 residential.service@sunpowercorp.com
